com.samsung.spensdk.applistener

Interface SPenTouchListener


  • public interface SPenTouchListener
    A listener interface for detecting S Pen Touch events.
    Since:
    S-Pen SDK 2.1

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onTouchButtonDown(View view, MotionEvent event)
      This handler is called when the side button of the stylus pen is pressed and the touch motion event occurs.
      void onTouchButtonUp(View view, MotionEvent event)
      This handler is called when the side button of the stylus pen is released and the touch motion event occurs.
      boolean onTouchFinger(View view, MotionEvent event)
      This handler is called when a touch motion event occurs.
      boolean onTouchPen(View view, MotionEvent event)
      This handler is called when the touch motion event occurs by the stylus pen.
      boolean onTouchPenEraser(View view, MotionEvent event)
      This handler is called when the touch motion event occurs by the eraser of the stylus pen.

    • Method Detail

      • onTouchPen

        boolean onTouchPen(View view,
                 MotionEvent event)
        This handler is called when the touch motion event occurs by the stylus pen.
        Parameters:
        view - The view the touch event is attached to
        event - The MotionEvent object containing information about the event
        Returns:
        True if the event was handled. Otherwise false.
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.1

      • onTouchPenEraser

        boolean onTouchPenEraser(View view,
                       MotionEvent event)
        This handler is called when the touch motion event occurs by the eraser of the stylus pen.
        Parameters:
        view - The view the touch event is attached to
        event - The MotionEvent object containing information about the event
        Returns:
        True if the event was handled. Otherwise false.
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.1

      • onTouchFinger

        boolean onTouchFinger(View view,
                    MotionEvent event)
        This handler is called when a touch motion event occurs.
        The associated meta state value is SObjectStroke.SAMM_METASTATE_HAND.
        Parameters:
        view - The view the touch event is attached to
        event - The MotionEvent object containing information about the event
        Returns:
        True if the event was handled. Otherwise false.
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.1

      • onTouchButtonDown

        void onTouchButtonDown(View view,
                     MotionEvent event)
        This handler is called when the side button of the stylus pen is pressed and the touch motion event occurs.
        Parameters:
        view - The view the touch event is attached to
        event - The MotionEvent object containing full information about the event.
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.1

      • onTouchButtonUp

        void onTouchButtonUp(View view,
                   MotionEvent event)
        This handler is called when the side button of the stylus pen is released and the touch motion event occurs.
        Parameters:
        view - The view the touch event is attached to
        event - The MotionEvent object containing information about the event
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.1
